SA01n790:3: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ tathāgatastamabhipretamartha vivṛtyaiva na deśayatītyāha daśānuśaṃsān saṃpaśyaṃstathāgataḥ sūcanākāreṇa dharma deśayati |
SA01n790:13: bhāvagamyo'yaṃ dharma ityavagamya jātāsthasya tasmin dharme ādaramukhena śraddhādisaṃbhāraparipūraṇāt |
SA01n790:19: abhiprāyārtha tīvreṇa yogena cintayitvā labdhavataḥ prāmodyaviśeṣādhigamāt |
SA01n790:22: ata eva paṇḍitaḥ paṇḍita iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati,
SA01n790:26: udānaṃ yadāttamanaskenodāhṛtam tadyathā yadā ime prādurbhavanti dharmā ityevamādi ||
SA01n790:27: nidānaṃ yatkiṃcideva pudgalamuddiśya bhāṣitaṃ sotpattikaśikṣā prajñaptikabhāṣitaṃ vā,
SA01n790:46: sūtrapiṭakavyavasthānaṃ vicikitsopakleśapratipakṣeṇa vineyānāmutpannānutpanna saṃśayacchedādhikāreṇa sūtrageyādi deśanāt |
SA01n790:52: punaḥ sūtrapiṭakaṃ niśritya vineyāḥ śikṣātraye vyutpadyante,
SA01n790:62: abhidharma niśritya parasparaṃ sāṃkathyaviniścayakṛtena dharmasaṃbhogena sparśavihāro bhavati,
SA01n790:63: tatra bahuprakāraṃ dharmāṇāṃ sva lakṣaṇādidharmatāyā vyutpādanāt ||
SA01n790:74: śataṃ śatasahastrāṇāṃ koṭirityevaṃ sarvāsūttarāsu saṃkhyāsvavaśyamanayoḥ daśaśatasaṃkhyayo ranyataropaniṣadbhavati |
SA01n790:75: ata ete eva samasya daśaśatānyeko dharmaskandho vyavasthāpyate |
SA01n790:76: anayā ca gaṇanayā caturaśītidharma skandhasahastrāṇyaṣṭau koṭyaḥ catvāriśacca lakṣā bhavanti ||
SA01n790:77: sa eṣa piṭakatrayasaṃgṛhīto dharmaḥ kasya gocaraḥ |
SA01n790:82: ākāraḥ, yān skandhādīnartha prakārānārabhya sā deśanā,
SA01n790:85: tatra deśanākāle paravijñaptirāśrayo yo'sāvucyate parato ghoṣata iti tata uttarakālaṃ smṛtirāśrayo yathāśrutamanusmṛtyābhyasanāt |
SA01n790:86: tata uttarakālaṃ vāsanā''śrayastadanusmṛtimantareṇāpi paścādabhyāsabhāvanā balena pratibhāsanāditi |
SA01n790:92: yāvadbhāvikatayā dharmāṇāmetāvanti sarvadharmavastuni yajjñeyavyavasthānam tadyathā skandhadhātvāyatanāni |
SA01n790:94: tadyathā satyamukhena tānyeva skandhadhātvāyatanāni yathāsaṃbhavaṃ duḥkhatojñeyāni yāvanmārgataḥ |
SA01n790:97: dharmoddānādhikāreṇa vā'nityataḥ sarvasaṃskārā jñeyā yāvacchāntato nirvāṇam |
SA01n790:101: yathāvadbhāvikatāyā nirdaśe ṣoḍaśaprakārā uktāstrayaśca vimokṣākārāḥ teṣāṃ cānyonyasaṃgrahaḥ |
SA01n790:110: na hyeṣāṃ nirhetuka utpādo nāpīśvarādiviṣamahetuka iti yajjñānamidaṃ pratītyasamutpāda kauśalyam |
SA01n790:112: tadyathā sucaritasyeṣṭo vipāko duścaritasyāniṣṭa ityevamādi yajjñānamidaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalyaṃ veditavyam ||
SA01n790:128: udakena kleda ityevamādikā prasiddhā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā |
SA01n790:129: yathoktaṃ cakṣuḥ samṛddhaṃ śūnyaṃ nityena yāvadātmīyena |
SA01n790:132: nāmaparyeṣaṇā nāmakāyādīnāṃ prajñapti sattvādapariniṣpannameṣāṃ svalakṣaṇa miti yā vicāraṇā |
SA01n790:133: vastuparyeṣaṇā skandhādīnāṃ tathā 'pariniṣpattiryathā nāmakāyādibhirabhilapyanta iti yā saṃtīraṇā parīkṣaṇetyarthaḥ |
SA01n790:137: tathāhi vyutpannavyavahārasyābhidhānamātraṃ śrutvā tadabhidheye saṃpratyaya utpadyate smṛtimukhena,
SA01n790:139: ityevaṃvidhe saṃbandhe prasiddhe cakṣurityevamādisvalakṣaṇaprajñaptimātraṃ tadākhyāmāsapiṇḍādivyavahārasya nimittaṃ bhavatīti yā parīkṣeyamucyate svabhāvaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā |
SA01n790:140: viśeṣaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā yā tathaivābhidhānābhidheya saṃbandhe nityānityotta rānuttararūpyasanidarśanānidarśanatā di viśeṣa lakṣaṇaprajñaptimātrasya vyavahāranimittatā saṃtīraṇā ||
SA01n790:143: tatra ādhāro yādṛśaṃ bāhuśrutyaṃ śamathavipaśyanayoḥ pratiṣṭhā bhavatyālaṃbanayogena tadādhāra ityucyate |
SA01n790:144: tatpunaḥ saṃbhṛta saṃbhārasya satyābhisamayamadhikṛtyodgṛhītaṃ yatsūtrādikaṃ śrutam |
SA01n790:151: kathaṃ ca punaḥ bodhisattva ekasyāṃ yaugabhūmau prayukto nopalambhaṃ spṛśati saṃbhṛtapuṇyajñāna saṃbhāro bodhisattvaḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyaniryātastathāprativedhānukūlaṃ śrutaṃ yoniśomanasi kurban samādhi niṣpādayati |
SA01n790:153: niśritya dhyāyati tatta smātsamāhitā ccittādananyaditi saṃparśyaṃ stasmin pratibimbe viṣayasaṃjñāṃ vyāvartya tadākāra svasaṃjñāmātramavadhārayati |
SA01n790:154: tadā cāsau svacittamātrāvasthānādadhyātma sthitacitto bhavan sarvathā grāhyabhāvaṃ prativedayate |
SA01n790:155: tataśca grāhyābhāvādgrāhakamapi na pariniṣpannamiti tasyāpyabhāvaṃ parivedayate |
SA01n790:157: etadeva cādhikṛtyoktaṃ bhagavatā pratibimbaṃ manaḥ paśyanni ti vistaraḥ |
SA01n790:160: sā ceyaṃ yogabhūmirhetutaḥ phalataśca nirdiṣṭā veditavyā |
SA01n790:162: yaduktaṃ sthavirānandena - pañcabhirāyuṣmañchāriputra dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bhikṣurlaghu ca gṛhṇātī tyatra sūtre taireva pañcabhirdharmairlaghugrahaṇādīni catvāri yathāyogaṃ veditavyāni |
SA01n790:164: dharmakuśalo laghu gṛhṇāti bāhuśrutyātprāyeṇa bhinna padavyañjanatayā |
SA01n790:169: sunirukta vyañjana jña tvādātmātmeti janapadaniruktimanabhiniviśyānuvyavahārajña tvācca granthārthayoraviparotagrahaṇataḥ |
SA01n790:171: pūrvamudgahītāndharmānniśritya paścānniḥ sartavyamiti buddhā bhisaṃdhijña tvādadhigamena tatsārādānataḥ ||
SA01n790:172: dharmavihārī bhikṣurdharmavihāri bhikṣuriti bhadantocyata ityatra sūtre bhagavatā samastena śrutacintābhāvanāvihāreṇa dharmavihāro bhavati,
SA01n790:174: tatra paryāptisvādhyāya deśanābahulā vitarkaṇā bahulāścetyanena kevalaṃ śrutacintāprayuktā na bhāvanāprayuktā yogādiriñcanādato[na] dharmavihāriṇo vyavasthāpyante |
SA01n790:175: yo'pi kaścicchrutacintāmanāgamya kevalaṃ bhāvanāprayuktaḥ syātso'pi na dharmavihārī vyavasthāpyate |
SA01n790:176: tata eva tāvaddharmavihāriṇaṃ bhikṣumārabhya iha tu bhikṣurddharma paryāpnoti sūtraṃ geyamiti vistareṇoktvā paścādāha na riñcati yogamityevamādi,
SA01n790:177: yathā vijñāyeta śrutaṃ cintāṃ bhāvanāṃ cāgamya tadubhayavihāreṇa dharmavihārīti |
SA01n790:178: na riñcati yāgamityevamādinā samādhiprayogāsaṃtuṣṭibhyāṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ saṃdarśitam |
SA01n790:179: samādhi prayogaḥ punadvividhaḥ saṃdarśitaḥ sātatyasatkṛtyaprayogasaṃgṛhītaśca na riñcati yogamityanena,
SA01n790:188: sarvākārayorvodhisattvābhyudaya niḥśreyasamārgayostisṛbhistisṛbhiśca saṃgrahāt ṣaḍevapāramitā na bhūyasyo nālpoyasya itīyaṃ tanmātrasaṃkhyā ||
SA01n790:221: yadbodhisattvasya bodhisattvadharmatāyāṃ vyavasthitasya bodhicittaṃ niśritya karuṇāpuraḥ - sareṇa cetasā sarvāstiparityāge kā yavāṅmanaskarma |
SA01n790:222: evaṃ ca kṛtvā dānapāramitāyāḥ lakṣaṇaṃ gotrataḥ praṇidhānata āśayato vastutaḥ svabhāvataśca nirdiṣṭaṃ veditavyam |
SA01n790:227: kāyavāṅmanaskarma svabhāva ityevaṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitā vistareṇa veditavyāḥ |
SA01n790:229: śa lakṣāntivīryapāramitāsu yathākramaṃ sarvasaṃvarasamādānānurakṣāyāṃ sarvā pakāraduḥkhamarṣaṇādhivāsanāyāṃ sarvakuśaladharmasamudānayanatāyāṃ yatkāyavāṅmanaskarmeti veditavyam |
SA01n790:231: prajñāpāramitā [yāṃ] sarvākārakāyavāṅmanaskarmavibhutve yaḥ sarvākāro dharmapravicaya iti vaktavyam |
SA01n790:233: punaryaddānaṃ sarvajñatāmārabhya sarvajñatāyai saṃvartate sarvajñatāṃ parigṛhṇāti sarvajñatākṛtyaṃ ca karoti taddānapārimitetyucyate |
SA01n790:234: etāni punaścatvāri padāni yathākramamārambhato vāsanātaḥ kāyato nisyandataśca veditavyāni |
SA01n790:238: tadeva yadā paripūrṇa bhavati tadā dharmakāyapariniṣpādanayogena sarvajñatāṃ parigṛhṇāti |
SA01n790:241: anukramaḥ | uttarottarasaṃniśrayatāmupādāya dānapāramitayā''dhyātmikabāhyasarvavastuparityāgābhyāsātkāyajīvitanirapekṣo bodhisattvo mahāntama pi bhogaskandhaṃ prahāya śīlasamādānaṃ karoti |
SA01n790:242: śīlānurakṣī - ākruṣṭena mayā na pratyākroṣṭavyam - ityevamādibhiḥ prakāraiḥ kṣamo bhavati |
SA01n790:246: saṃpannadhyānaśca samāhitacitto yathābhūtajñānāllokottarāṃ prajñāṃ pratilabhata iti ||
SA01n790:281: dvādaśavidhaṃ punaḥ paramatvam - audāryaparamatvaṃ sarvalokasampattyanarthitvādutkṛ[ṣṭa] tvācca |
SA01n790:292: niṣpattiparamatvaṃ daśamyāṃ bhūmau tāthā gatyāṃ ca bodhisattvapariniṣpattyā buddhapariniṣpattyā ceti ||
SA01n790:297: punaḥ parānā tmānaṃ ca paramāmīti tārayantoti pāramitāḥ,
SA01n790:303: krodhakṣāratiraskaraṇāt kṣaticittā gati tiraskaraṇāt kṣemāviṣkaraṇācca kṣatināṃ kṣāntiḥ |
SA01n790:304: kṣaticittaṃ punaryenāpa kāriṇāṃ pratyapakāraḥ kriyate tasyāgatasyānayā vilopanaṃ tiraskaraṇaṃ veditavyam |
SA01n790:305: kṣatameṣāṃ vairaṃ vidyata iti kṣatinasteṣāmabhayaprakāśanaṃ kṣemasyāviṣkaraṇaṃ veditavyam |
SA01n790:308: vṛddhaye īhā kuśaladharmasamudāgamāya dvābhyāṃ samyakprahāṇābhyāṃ ca |
SA01n790:316: tatra parapraṇītajñānaṃ parato ghoṣānvayā yoniśomanaskārasaṃprayuktā prajñā ,
SA01n790:324: hetusaṃniśritā yo gotrabalena pāramitāsu pratipattyabhyāsaḥ vipākasaṃniśritā ya ātmabhāvasaṃpattibalena |
SA01n790:333: āśayasaṃniśritā pāramitābhāvanā ṣaḍākārā - atṛptāśayena vaipulyā śayena muditāśayenopakarāśayena nirlepāśayena kalyāṇāśayena ca |
SA01n790:334: tatra bodhisattvasya dāne'tṛptāśayo yadbodhi sattvasyaikakṣaṇe gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānloka dhātūn saptaratnaparipūrṇān pratipādayato gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāṃścātmabhāva nevaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ gaṅgānadī bālikāsamān kalpān pratipādayataḥ |
SA01n790:335: yathā caikasattvasyaivaṃ yāvān sattvadhāturanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācitavyaḥ |
SA01n790:336: tamanena paryāyeṇa pratipādayedatṛpta eva bodhisattvasya dānāśaya iti |
SA01n790:338: na ca bodhisattva evaṃrūpāṃ dāna paraṃparāṃ kṣaṇamātramapi hāpayati vicchinattyābodhimaṇḍaniṣadanāditi |
SA01n790:339: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dāne vipulāśayaḥ |
SA01n790:341: na ca te sattvāstena dānenānugṛhyamāṇā iti |
SA01n790:342: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dāne muditāśayaḥ |
SA01n790:343: upakaratarāṃśca bodhisattvastān sattvānātmanaḥ samanupaśyati yeṣāṃ tathā dānenopakaroti nātmānam,
SA01n790:345: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dāne upakarāśayaḥ |
SA01n790:346: na ca bodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu tathā vipulamapi dānamayaṃ puṇyamabhi saṃskṛtya pratikāreṇa vā'rthī bhavati vipākena veti |
SA01n790:347: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dānapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ nirlepāśayaḥ |
SA01n790:348: yadbodhisattvastathā vipulasyāpi dānaskandhasya vipākaṃ sattveṣvevābhinandati nātmanaḥ,
SA01n790:350: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dānapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ kalyāṇāśayaḥ |
SA01n790:352: yadbodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣvātmabhāveṣu gaṅgānadī vālikāsamakalpāyuḥpramāṇeṣu sarvopakaraṇanirantaravighātī trisāhastramahāsāhastre lokadhātāvāgniparipūrṇe caturvidhamīryāpathaṃ kalpayannekaṃ śīlapāramitākṣaṇaṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitākṣaṇaṃ bhāvayet,
SA01n790:353: etena paryāyeṇa yāvacchīlaskandho yāvatprajñāskandho yenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
SA01n790:355: atṛpta evaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāmāśayo yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanā[yā]māśaya iti |
SA01n790:357: yadbodhisattvastāṃ śīlapāramitābhāvanāparaṃparāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāparaṃparamā bodhimaṇḍaniṣadanānna bhraṃśayati na vicchinattīti |
SA01n790:358: ya evaṃrūpa āśāyo'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ vipulāśayaḥ |
SA01n790:359: muditataraśca bodhisattvo bhavati tayā śīlapāramitābhāvanayā yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanayā sattvānanugṛhṇan,
SA01n790:360: na tveva te sattvā anugṛhyamāṇā iti |
SA01n790:361: ya evaṃrūpaāśayo'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ muditāśayaḥ |
SA01n790:362: upakaratarāṃśca sa bodhisattvastān sattvānātmanaḥ samanupaśyati yeṣāṃ tathā śīlapāramitābhāvanayā yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanayā upakarāti nātmānam,
SA01n790:364: ya evarūpa āśayo'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāmupakarāśayaḥ |
SA01n790:365: na ca bodhisattvastathā vipulamapi śīlapāramitāmayaṃ yāvatprajñā pāramitāmayaṃ puṇyamabhisaṃskṛtya tasya pratikāreṇa vā'rthī bhavati vipākena veti |
SA01n790:366: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitā yāṃ nirlepāśayaḥ |
SA01n790:367: tatra yadbodhisattva evaṃ śīlapāramitābhāvanāmayasya yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāmayasya puṇyaskandhasya vipākaṃ sattveṣvevābhinandati nātmanaḥ,
SA01n790:369: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ kalyāṇāśayaḥ ||
SA01n790:374: tatra kāyavibhutvaṃ tāthāgatau dvau kāyau draṣṭavyau svābhāvikaḥ sāṃbhogikaśca |
SA01n790:375: tatra caryāvibhutvaṃ nairmāṇikaḥ kāyo draṣṭavyo yena sarvākārāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ sahadhārmikacaryā darśayati |
SA01n790:395: pratyekaṃ dānādīnāṃ traivighyāt tribhistribhirupastambhairyathākramaṃ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ |
SA01n790:396: tatra trividhaṃ dānam - abhayadānaṃ dharmadānamāmiṣadānaṃ ca |
SA01n790:397: trividhaṃ śīlam - saṃvaraśīlaṃ kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaṃ śīlaṃ sattvārthakriyāśīlaṃ ca |
SA01n790:399: trividhaṃ vīryam - saṃnāhavīrya prayogavīrya sattvā rthakriyāvīrya ca |
SA01n790:400: trividhaṃ dhyānam - dṛṣṭadharmasukhāvihārāya dhyānamabhijñānirhārāya dhyānaṃ sattvārthakriyāyai ca dhyānam |
SA01n790:401: trividhā prajñā - saṃvṛtyālaṃbanā paramārthālaṃbanā sattvārthālambanā ca ||
SA01n790:404: abhayadānaṃ cittopastambhaḥ daurmanasyaviśeṣā[pa]gamāya cetasa āśvāsāya saṃhārāt |
SA01n790:408: kuśalamūlā kṣayatā sarvasattveṣu kriyārthādhikāritayā yāvatsāraṃ nirupadhiśeṣe'pi nirvāṇadhātāvaparityāgaḥ,
SA01n790:410: gaṇaparikarṣaṇaṃ karma adhigamaṃ niśritya vineyānāmasamāhitasya cittasya samādhānāya samāhitasya vā cittasya vimokṣāyāvavādānuśāsanopradānam,
SA01n790:412: bhūmipraveśo yayā deśanayā dharmādhimuktipūrvikayā saṃbhāraparipūryāpramuditāṃ bhūmi praviśati,
SA01n790:415: punaḥ prabhedaḥ sapta dānāmi - mūladānaṃ gotrāvasthasya bodhisattvasya dānapāramitā,
SA01n790:423: vinā vāhyenopakaraṇaparigraheṇa gaganagañjādisamādhibhirākāśe pāṇi saṃcārya yatheṣṭaṃ ratnādivarṣaṇāt |
SA01n790:436: tadanena viśiṣṭena cittotpādena pāramitānāṃ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ,
SA01n790:439: yatpunaḥ parānupakaraṇopasaṃhāreṇānugṛhṇātyayaṃ svārthaḥ evamavaśiṣṭābhiḥ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ |
SA01n790:449: ityevaṃ tathatāsamyajjñānasvabhāvataḥ paramārtho dānādibhiḥ saṃgṛhīto veditavyaḥ |
SA01n790:451: vipakṣo dānādīnāṃ yathākramaṃ mātsaryadauḥśīlye krodhakauśīdye vikṣepadauḥprajñe |
SA01n790:452: api khalu yāvantaḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ pāramitābhiḥ saṃgṛhītāsteṣāṃ yo vipakṣo jñeyāvaraṇaṃ ca sa tāsāṃ vipakṣo veditavyaḥ ||
SA01n790:458: mahābhogatā sugatigamanamavarābhedasukhasaumanasya bahulatā sattvādhipa patyamavyābādhyātma bhāvatā maheśākhyatā ca yathākramaṃ dānādīnāṃ vipākaphalaṃ veditavyam |
SA01n790:465: tatraiva yā maitracittasya paratravighā totpīḍāviheṭhasaṃvaraṇatā sā śīlapāramitā |
SA01n790:467: tatraiva yā bhūyo bhūyaścittasyotsahanatā sā vīryapāramitā |
SA01n790:468: tatraiva yā cittasyaikāgratā kuśalādbahiravisaraṇatā sā dhyānapāramitā |
SA01n790:469: ta traiva yā yathāvaddhetu phalasugṛhītatā dṛṣṭaya parāmarṣaṇatā sā prajñāpāramitā |
SA01n790:470: evaṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyamubhayadānaṃ sarvajñajñānamiti kṛtvā ||
SA01n790:473: tatra dānādīnāṃ svabhāvo yathākramaṃ visargaḥ saṃvaro marṣaṇā'bhyutsāhaścitasthitiḥ pravicayaśca |
SA01n790:475: tatra dānādīnāmupayogaḥ samādāpanā varṇavāditā sumanojñatā ca |
SA01n790:476: tatra dānādīnāṃ ropaṇā yā parasaṃtāne pratiṣṭhāpanā |
SA01n790:484: syāddānapāramitā na śīlapāramitā śīlapāramitayā'saṃgṛhītā yā dānapāramitā |
SA01n790:487: yā dāna pāramitā sarva taddānamiti catuṣkoṭikam |
SA01n790:489: syāt pāramitā na dānaṃ śīlādayo mahābodhipariṇāmitāḥ |
SA01n790:490: syāddānaṃ ca pāramitā ca bodhipariṇāmitāni dānādīni |
SA01n790:491: syānna dānaṃ na pāramitā uktavinirmuktā dharmāḥ |
SA01n790:493: yo dānaṃ samācarati sarvo'sau dānapāramitānvayaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavatīti ca tuṣkoṭikam |
SA01n790:499: viśeṣato vaipulye audāryagāmbhīryadeśanā tatphalasya sarvajñatvasya paramodāra gambhīratvātphalānurūpyeṇa henunirdeśo draṣṭavyaḥ ||
SA01n790:500: ekatyānāṃ tadanadhimokṣe trāsaḥ bodhisattvagotravaikalyaṃ prakṛtyā hīnacittatayā gāmbhīryaudāryadeśanāṃ nādhimoktuṃ śaknuvanti |
SA01n790:501: satyapi tadgotratve mahābodhimārabhya praṇidhānādīnāṃ kuśalamūlādo nāmanavaropaṇāt,
SA01n790:503: adhimucyamānānāmapyekatyānāmaniryāṇaṃ nītārtha sūtrama[na]nviṣya svayaṃ dṛṣṭiparāmarṣasthāyitayā yathārutamarthābhiniveśāta |
SA01n790:505: evamanye'pi yathārutārthābhiniveśino mahāyāne na niryāntotiveditavyaṃ nānābhiprāyabhāṣitatvāt mahāyānasyeti |
SA01n790:506: idaṃ ca saṃdhāyoktaṃ bhagavatā mahādharmādarśe dharmaparyāye - bodhisattvasya yathārutamayoniśo dharmān vicinvato 'ṣṭāviṃśatirasaddṛṣṭaya utpadyante ||
SA01n790:509: tatra nisvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā anutpannā ityevamādikaṃ mahāyāne rutamupalabhya tadabhisaṃdhyakuśalāḥ yathārutamevāsyārthamadhimucyamānā abhāva evāyaṃ bhagavatā deśitaḥ sarvadharmāṇāmanutpāda evetyabhāvādinimittamabhiniviśante saiṣāṃ bhavati nimittadṛṣṭiḥ |
SA01n790:510: ta evamabhāvādinimittamabhiniviśamānāstronsvabhāvānavadante parikalpitaṃ svabhāvaṃ paratantraṃ pariniṣpannaṃ ca |
SA01n790:511: tatrāyaṃ parikalpitaḥ svabhāvo yadrūpamiti vā yāvannirvāṇāmiti vā'bhilāpaprajñaptimātrabhabhūto niḥśarīrārtho yadbālā rūpādilakṣaṇaṃ samāropattaḥ parikalpayanti |
SA01n790:513: tatrāyaṃ pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāvo yatsarvadharmāṇāṃ tattvaṃ tathatā |
SA01n790:515: ta evaṃ sarvathā sarvadharmānapavadamā nāstasyā apavādadṛṣṭeḥ pratiṣṭhāpa nārthaṃ kāṃcideva yuktiṃ parigṛhṇanti,
SA01n790:516: ye'pi nītārthāḥ sūtrāntā nirabhilāpadharmatādyotakāstānapi sarvān svadṛṣṭayānulomyena pariṇāmayanti |
SA01n790:517: te eva dve dṛṣṭo bhavataḥ parigrahadṛṣṭiḥ pariṇatidṛṣṭiśca |
SA01n790:518: te punarevaṃdṛṣṭayo bhavanti - ya etāmīdṛśīṃ dṛṣṭiṃ niśritya kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā samācarati sa niravadya eva bhavati nirdoṣaḥ sarvamevāsya tatkalyāṇatāṃ yāti,
SA01n790:520: te caivaṃ svadṛṣṭāvabhiniviṣṭāstad dṛṣṭiviparyayeṇa skandhādidharmavyavasthāpakaṃ śrāvakapiṭakamavajānanti,
SA01n790:521: ye ca tāmapavādadṛṣṭimanadhimuktāḥ śrāvakayā nīyāstān pradviṣanti |
SA01n790:522: te ete dve dṛṣṭī bhavato'vajñādṛṣṭiḥ prakopadṛṣṭiśca |
SA01n790:523: svadṣṭayanusāreṇa caite yathāvacchūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni vyavasthāpayamānā atallakṣaṇe tallakṣaṇasaṃjñino viparītameṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthāpayanti,
SA01n790:524: evaṃcittāśca bhavanti - yasyāmīdṛśyāṃ dharmatāyāmavatarantyavatārayanti vā sarve te'prameyaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavantītyevamete dṛṣṭī viparītadṛṣṭiḥ prasavadṛṣṭiśca |
SA01n790:525: yadā punaste tāṃ dṛṣṭimārabhya paraṃranuyujyante tadā na kiṃcitsvayamicchantyabhyupagantum,
SA01n790:528: te caivamabhimānino bhavanti - ya evaṃ pratipadyante [te] samyagbuddhān bhagavataḥ pūjayanti satkurvantītyeṣāṃ satkāradṛṣṭiḥ |
SA01n790:529: aviparītadharmatākuśalaiśca tatā dṛṣṭervivecyamānāḥ sūpapannayā prasiddhayā yuktayā pratyāyamānā api tāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ na kathaṃcit parityajanti,
SA01n790:531: etāsāṃ ca yathānirdiṣṭānāṃ dṛṣṭonāṃ yadvāsanādauṣṭhulyaṃ sā mūladṛṣṭiḥ |
SA01n790:532: eta eva ca saptadaśadṛṣṭayo doṣodbhāvanāmukhenāvaśiṣṭābhiḥ dṛṣṭibhiḥ punarnidiśyante |
SA01n790:555: ata evānantaraṃ tatraiva sūtra uktamitīmāḥ saptadaśa samānāḥ daśa bhavanti,
SA01n790:559: niḥ svabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ yasmātsvayameṣāṃ bhāvo nāsti,
SA01n790:561: yena vā svabhāvenaite pūrvamabhūvanna tena svena bhāvena bhūyaḥ śakyamebhirbhavitumiti niḥsvabhāvāḥ |
SA01n790:563: yādṛśo vā'dṛṣṭasatyairdharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo lakṣaṇamabhilāpaprapañcavāsanāmukhena gṛhyate tena bālagrāhānurūpeṇa svabhāvena vi[ra]hitatvānniḥ svabhāvāḥ ||
SA01n790:564: api khalu sarvadharmā ucyante trayaḥ svabhāvāḥ |
SA01n790:565: tatra parikalpitasya svalakṣaṇameva nāstyataḥ svalakṣaṇaniḥsvabhāvatayā niḥsvabhāvaḥ |
SA01n790:566: paratantrasya svayamutpattirnāsti pratyayāpekṣaṇādato nāsya svena bhāvena bhāva ityutpattiniḥ svabhāvatayā niḥsvabhāvaḥ |
SA01n790:567: pariniṣpanno viśuddhyālaṃbanatvāt paratantraparikalpitalakṣaṇābhāvasvabhāvatvācca paramārthaścaiṣa niḥsvabhāvatāprabhāvitaśceti paramārthaniḥsvabhāvatayā niḥsvabhāvaḥ |
SA01n790:568: ityevaṃ ca kṛtvā niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā draṣṭavyāḥ,
SA01n790:570: api khalu mahāyāne tathāgatasya sarve'bhiprāyāḥ saṃkṣepeṇa catvāro bhavanti |
SA01n790:571: tadyathā samatābhiprāyo yadāha - ahameva tasmin samaye vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddho'bhūvamiti,
SA01n790:573: kālāntarābhiprāyoyadāha - ye sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau praṇidhānaṃ kariṣyanti te tatropa patsyanta iti,
SA01n790:574: vimalacandraprabhavasya ca nāmadheyagrahaṇamātreṇa niyato bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti,
SA01n790:576: arthāntarābhiprāyo yadāha - niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā anutpannā ityevamādi,
SA01n790:578: pudgalāśayābhiprāyo yattadeva kuśalamūlaṃ kasyacitpraśaṃsanti kasyacidvigarha te'lpamātrasaṃtuṣṭasya |
SA01n790:581: kaukṛtyenāvṛtasya ye buddhabodhisattveṣvapakāramapi kariṣyanti te sarve svargopagā bhaviṣyantītyāha |
SA01n790:583: ekaṃ ca yānaṃ na dvitīyamastīti deśayati śrāvakatvāśayatyājanārtham ||
SA01n790:591: tadudāharaṇāni ca yathāyogaṃ caturabhiprāryāna rdeśāni draṣṭavyāni |
SA01n790:594: kleśena ca susaṃkliṣṭā labhante bodhimuttamām || iti |
SA01n790:596: vikṣepo hi visāraśce tasaḥ viparyāse ca susthitāḥ iti nityasukhaśucyātmaviparyayeṇānityādike viparyāse ca susthitā aparihāṇitaḥ kleśena ca susaṃkliṣṭāḥ iti dīrghaduṣkara vyāyāmaśrameṇātyartha parikliṣṭāḥ ||
SA01n790:597: vaipulye dharmasamādhikuśalabodhisattvanirdeśaḥ śamathānuśaṃsaṃ vipaśyanānuśaṃsaṃ tadubhayānuśaṃsaṃ cādhikṛtya veditavyaḥ |
SA01n790:599: kṣaṇe kṣaṇe prakarṣagāminyā prastrabdhyā nirantaramāśrayaspharaṇāt pratikṣaṇaṃ sarvadauṣṭhulyāśraya drāvaṇam,
SA01n790:604: tadubhayānuśaṃso dharmakāyasya jñeyāvaraṇa prahāṇāśrayaparivṛttisaṃgṛhītasya paripūraye daśamyāṃ bhūmau pariniṣpattaye vā tāthāgatyāṃ bhūmāvuttarāduttaratara niṣyandavāsanādhānayogena hetuparigraha iti ||
SA01n790:605: tadetatpañcavidhāyā bhāvanāyāḥ phalaṃ pañcavidhaṃ nirvartata iti saṃdarśitam |
SA01n790:608: kena kāraṇena tulye dharmakāyaniṣyandatve vaipulyadharmo dhūpamālyādibhiḥ pūjyo na tathā śrāvakayāna dharmaḥ |
